monogr.title: Omnes Circumadstantes: Contributions towards a History of the Role of the People in the Liturgy Presented to Herman Wegman on the Occasion of His Retirement from the Chair of History of Liturgy and Theology in the Katholieke Theologische Universiteit Utrecht

body.bibl: Rouwhorst, Gerard A. M. “La Célébration de l’eucharistie Selon Les Actes de Thomas.” In Omnes Circumadstantes: Contributions towards a History of the Role of the People in the Liturgy Presented to Herman Wegman on the Occasion of His Retirement from the Chair of History of Liturgy and Theology in the Katholieke Theologische Universiteit Utrecht, edited by Charles M. A. Caspers and Marc Schneider, 51–77. Kampen: Kok, 1990.

Rouwhorst, La Célébration de l’eucharistie Selon Les Actes de Thomas, in Omnes Circumadstantes: Contributions towards a History of the Role of the People in the Liturgy Presented to Herman Wegman on the Occasion of His Retirement from the Chair of History of Liturgy and Theology in the Katholieke Theologische Universiteit Utrecht, ed.
